overview: The class of 2018 takes their rightful place in the Hall of Fame, during Wrestlemania 34 weekend. Inductees include headliner Goldberg, The Dudley Boyz, Ivory, "Double J" Jeff Jarrett, Hillbilly Jim, Mark Henry, Warrior Award Recipient Jarius "JJ" Robertson, and Celebrity inductee Kid Rock.
title: WWE Hall of Fame 2018
